description: Array T read by rows: T(i,0)=1 for i >= 0; T(i,i)=0 for i=0,1,2,3; T(i,i)=0 for i >= 4; T(i,j)=T(i-1,j)+T(i-2,j-1) for 1<=j<=i-1.
comments: T(i+j,j)=number of strings (s(1),...,s(i+1)) of nonnegative integers s(k) such that 0<=s(k)-s(k-1)<=1 for k=2,3,...,i+1 and s(i+1)=j.T(i+j,j)=number of compositions of j consisting of i parts, all of in {0,1}.
author: _Clark Kimberling_, May 28 2000
